The importance of protecting
your right to recovery

If you or a loved one has been injured in a car accident, it is important to explore all of your legal options. You may be entitled to financial recovery. Though money alone won't undo the harm you have suffered, it can pave the way to a smoother recovery. You will pay no attorney's fees unless we obtain compensation for you. At the law offices of Gordon & Partners our car accident lawyers help injured clients across the state fight for justice. As a trusted car accident law firm in Florida, we offer caring, compassionate representation for all types of auto accidents.

No recovery fee

Here’s what “no recovery no fee” means at our firm:

  • First, your initial consultation is absolutely free.
  • Next, there are no hourly fees.
  • Finally, you owe no up-front expenses as we work on your case.
  • You only pay us a percentage of your recovery when we win.
  • Call us today for a free consultation: 1 (855) 722-2552.
